page.title: 18SCHOOL SPORTS
page.content: In the summer term the school has a Sports Day. Many events go to make up sports day with such things as Sack races, Egg and Spoon races and Bean Bag races as well as the more conventional running and jumping competitions. Much practice is put in by each child before the day with even the youngest children playing a full part. A large number of parents and friends come and watch and the whole day is very enjoyable. Later on in that same term the school takes part in an Area Sports meeting with three other schools of a comparable size with the most able of our athletes representing the school.
